```
$ curl -c cookie http://localhost:3000
$ cat cookie
# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# http://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

localhost	FALSE	/	FALSE	0	XSRF-TOKEN	DMr5fxv8XzX0I0o65SIV7u9lfmdqnZmtaj9JnJjmhD4%3D
#HttpOnly_localhost	FALSE	/	FALSE	0	_raymond_session	YjFmVXAybVFUOW9OeWFPekxSOWNGYXNqV0orNDUrdVkrbGZpekQ1L2thU3ovcmtIU0IzZ2d2RUtmRGwvZ1g3NkRJU2phb01aMkJDcXhha0IwL3JLMk5Jbk1rbUpGZmtGNmZBREJHbCtjV2p3YjVUT3VsSlhxMVIxcTFvOE5aZjVFM05CcFNWNEJnblZYdGZkQmxyWldnPT0tLWU5TktvNlAxeUcrSWk3TkJuWTFtb2c9PQ%3D%3D--e40d873c5d76ede0130eadee532f8a195e37f48c
localhost	FALSE	/	FALSE	0	__profilin	p%3Dt

# decode XSRF-TOKEN, i.e., change %3D to =, and set as the value of authenticity_token
$ curl -X POST -b cookie -F "user[email]=me@example.com" -F "user[password]=password" -F "authenticity_token=DMr5fxv8XzX0I0o65SIV7u9lfmdqnZmtaj9JnJjmhD4=" http://localhost:3000/users/sign_in
<html><body>You are being <a href="http://localhost:3000/projects/2/activity">redirected</a>.</body></html>
$ cat cookie
# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# http://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

localhost	FALSE	/	FALSE	0	XSRF-TOKEN	DMr5fxv8XzX0I0o65SIV7u9lfmdqnZmtaj9JnJjmhD4%3D
#HttpOnly_localhost	FALSE	/	FALSE	0	_raymond_session	YjFmVXAybVFUOW9OeWFPekxSOWNGYXNqV0orNDUrdVkrbGZpekQ1L2thU3ovcmtIU0IzZ2d2RUtmRGwvZ1g3NkRJU2phb01aMkJDcXhha0IwL3JLMk5Jbk1rbUpGZmtGNmZBREJHbCtjV2p3YjVUT3VsSlhxMVIxcTFvOE5aZjVFM05CcFNWNEJnblZYdGZkQmxyWldnPT0tLWU5TktvNlAxeUcrSWk3TkJuWTFtb2c9PQ%3D%3D--e40d873c5d76ede0130eadee532f8a195e37f48c
localhost	FALSE	/	FALSE	0	__profilin	p%3Dt

$ curl -X POST -b cookie -F "event_name=uploadFile" -F "event_properties={}" -F "authenticity_token=DMr5fxv8XzX0I0o65SIV7u9lfmdqnZmtaj9JnJjmhD4=" http://localhost:3000/events
```
